title: Collaborative Cloud-Based Mathematics Education Design to Strengthen Integrated Reading-Writing Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematical concepts and basic document drafting skills
context.additional_context: Program for culturally diverse undergraduate students to integrally develop mathematical concept comprehension and explanatory writing skills, using cloud-based collaborative tools with personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can summarize and reconstruct the core ideas of mathematical concept texts with 80% accuracy
Learners can write mathematical concept explanations incorporating peer evaluation and feedback using cloud-based collaboration tools
Learners can synthesize mathematical information from diverse sources to compose coherent argumentative essays of over 1,000 characters
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
